title: Noun Collection 1
sentences: The provisions of the law apply to every citizen.
The defendant is waiting for the court's verdict.
The system of administration of justice is fundamental in a democracy.
The refugees sought protection/shelter in the neighboring country.
A serious omission/negligence occurred during the security check.
The modification of the contract requires longer negotiations.
He prepared for his exams with great diligence.
The punishment was reduced based on the principle of equity/fairness.
meggyőzőbb volt, mint az eredeti vád.
The refutation was more convincing than the original accusation.
He got mixed up in suspicion of committing the crime.
After removing the obstacle, the construction could continue.
The weighing/deliberation of the decision lasted for days.
nem volt alaptalan, de túlságosan éles volt.
The criticism was not groundless, but it was too sharp.
The withdrawal of the provision caused great outrage.
árán sikerült csak befejezni a projektet.
The project could only be finished at the cost of much labor/effort.
The illustration/demonstration helped in understanding the complicated process.
The disregard/neglect affected the experienced colleague painfully.
The culmination/aggravation of events led to a tragedy.
időszaka után végre megtalálta a hivatását.
After a period of wandering/erring, he finally found his calling.
jelei mutatkoztak rajta a kényelmetlen kérdésektől.
Signs of unease/fidgeting appeared on him from the uncomfortable questions.
The phantom sketch was drawn based on the witness's description.
The sketch/outline of the plan does not yet contain every detail.
hulláma söpört végig a közösségi médián.
A wave of indignation swept through social media.
The right to object belongs to everyone involved.
Instead of promotion/advancement, they hindered the processes.
dictionary:
rendelkezés - provision / regulation
ítélet - verdict / judgment
igazságszolgáltatás - administration of justice
oltalom - protection / shelter
mulasztás - omission / negligence
módosítás - modification
szorgalom - diligence
méltányosság - equity / fairness
cáfolat - refutation
gyanú - suspicion
akadály - obstacle / hindrance
mérlegelés - weighing / deliberation
bírálat - criticism
fáradozás - labor / effort
szemléltetés - illustration / demonstration
mellőzés - disregard / neglect
tetézés - aggravation / culmination
tévelygés - wandering / erring
feszengés - unease / fidgeting
ecsetelés - description / painting a picture (verbally)
vázlat - sketch / outline
méltatlankodás - indignation
kifogásolás - objection
előmozdítás - promotion / advancement
